mapper.select: SELECT t.id, FUNC_GET_DEPTNAME(t.request_dept) requestDept, to_char(t.request_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') || 'T' || to_char(t.request_date,'hh24:mi') requestDate, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.requester) requester, t.file_title fileTitle, t.delivery_emp_id deliveryEmpId, t.make_emp_id makeEmpId, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.delivery_emp_id) deliveryEmpIdShow, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.make_emp_id) makeEmpIdShow, t.secret_class secretClass, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.secret_class,'MJ') secretClassShow, t.title title, t.printing_number printingNumber, t.symbol symbol, t.request_flag, t.creator, t.create_time, t.create_dept, t.changer, t.change_time, t.change_dept, t.valid_flag FROM T_BG_DOCUMENT_WF t WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY t.create_time desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BG_DOCUMENT_WF (id,request_dept,requester,request_date, file_title,delivery_emp_id,make_emp_id, secret_class,title,printing_number, symbol,creator,create_time,create_dept,request_flag) values ('${id}','${createDept}','${creator}',to_date('${requestDate}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'),'${fileTitle}', '${deliveryEmpId}','${makeEmpId}','${secretClass}','${title}', '${printingNumber}','${symbol}','${creator}',sysdate,'${createDept}','0')
mapper.update: update T_BG_DOCUMENT_WF SET id = #{id}, file_title = #{fileTitle}, delivery_emp_id = #{deliveryEmpId}, make_emp_id = #{makeEmpId}, secret_class = #{secretClass}, title = #{title}, printing_number = #{printingNumber}, symbol = #{symbol}, changer= #{changer}, change_time= sysdate, change_dept= #{changeDept} WHERE id = #{id}
update T_BG_DOCUMENT_WF SET symbol = #{symbol}, changer= #{changer}, change_time= sysdate, change_dept= #{changeDept} WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT t.id, t.document_id documentId, t.handle_id handleId, t.edition edition, t.file_name fileName, t.file_url fileUrl, t.file_suffix fileSuffix, t.file_size fileSize, t.creator, t.create_time, t.create_dept, t.changer, t.change_time, t.change_dept, t.valid_flag FROM T_BG_DOCUMENT_PROCESS t WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY t.create_time desc

mapper.update: update T_BG_DOCUMENT_PROCESS SET id = #{id}, document_id = #{documentId}, handle_id = #{handleId}, edition = #{edition}, file_name = #{fileName}, file_url = #{fileUrl}, file_suffix = #{fileSuffix}, file_size = #{fileSize}, changer= #{changer}, change_time= sysdate, change_dept= #{changeDept} WHERE id = #{id}

select * from t_sys_workflow_start where business_id = #{id}
